reviews.customers_say: Customers find the cardigan comfortable and well-made, with good material quality and a weight that's perfect for cool summer evenings. They appreciate its appearance, noting it looks more expensive than it is, and like its vibrant colors, particularly the deep purple and true bright green options. The fit receives positive feedback, with one customer mentioning the ribbing provides a slightly curvy silhouette. Howev

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Runs super small but it’s very nice (Edited twice)
items.body: Latest Edit: I have this in every size and color now. Now I’m 116 pounds and wear a small, but if you like your sweaters loose size up. It’s fitted on the body and now that I’m slender I like it that way too. I wear these all the time in restaurants and cold offices. They never pill and wash and dry nicely. I hate all the sweaters that pill lately. This one absolutely does not pill. Never wrinkles and it’s soft. The baby blue and pink one is really cute with jeans. I love the longish sleeves. Edit *I’ve had this sweater for a while now. I’ve worn it at least 20 times. No pilling. The shape holds up after washing. I have dried it and if there was any shrinkage it was not noticeable. I weigh 150 now (Thank you Ozempic) and I’m 5’5. I have this sweater in 3 different sizes now. There isn’t a huge difference between any of them. I have a medium and it fits slim and looks nice. The large fits very similar to the medium but is just a wee bit looser. The 2x even fits and is just slightly looser but still fits well. The sleeves are super long the way I like them. It’s soft and quite nice BUT if you are not into skin tight size up.* I have this sweater in 4 colors and have received compliments from strangers in public. It’s definitely worth the money. This is my fave sweater this season. Read more
items.author: MSpo57

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Versatile
items.body: This sweater fits well and I love the color. I've washed it a couple of times and it still looks great. It's nice for casual wear or for dressing up. Read more
items.author: Meari

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice sweater
items.body: Nice sweater. I bought the medium because the reviews said it runs a little loose. I am 5’ 6” and 144 lbs and it is a little loose. I’m glad I did not buy the large it would have been too baggy. I don’t like my sweaters too tight so it really feels comfortable. The knit does tend to stretch out a bit when wearing. Th we instructions say machine wash, line dry, which I do but I toss it in the dryer when it’s almost dry to tighten the knit a little. I bought this sweater in off white and blue. Great addition to my wardrobe. Perfect weight for a cool summer day or evening. Read more
items.author: Carolyn Schmidt

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Slim-fitting but true to size and flattering
items.body: Slim-fitting as designed but true to size (I'm a busty size 12, and the large fit well). I got the Kelly green and the color is true to the photos. Very cute and will look good over sleeveless dresses or with jeans. Looks more expensive than it was. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful
items.body: Nice quality. Beautiful pink. Read more
items.author: Sherri

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars fit is disappointing
items.body: I unpacked this sweater and instantly thought this is going to be my go to brand for sweaters. It is soft, classic style and perfect. I also bought a cheaper brand sweater which was nice, but this was exactly the feel and look I wanted. Well, I washed them both, no dryer. They both did well. Then I tried them on. This sweater feels lovely. The button area has enough material to not gap. The cheaper one I purchased will only be worn open because of that. BUT this one has something weird going on under the arm pits. Like there is too much material. I am busty. 42DD, and normally if a shirt/sweater doesn't fit it's not reaching around me in the chest, or popping buttons. This buttoned or unbuttoned still has these weird puffs of extra material. I will keep it as I laundered it already, but am SO disappointed. I saw more cute and nice options of their brand but too unhappy about this one to bother trying another one. Read more
items.author: kds

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality made
items.body: I love this sweater. It has a great fit and of good quality fabric. It holds it's shape after washing. With no pilling. Read more
items.author: Nancy Parsons

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute form fitting sweater.
items.author: Steph Hooper

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Mid Khaki, Mid Yellow, Black, Bright White, Coffee, Oatmeal, Red, Navy, Pink, White, Flower Grey, Caramel, Dark Purple, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
